description:
Jiraiya and Naruto are on a journey to find Tsunade, one of the legendary Sannin. Jiraiya`s purpose is both to protect Naruto from the clutches of the mysterious organization the Akatsuki and to train his apprentice.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Naruto et Jiraya... Sources de problèmes
Oh, Noo! Jiraiya no Jounan, Naruto no Sainan
Ohhhhh Nein! Jiraias Frauenprobleme und Narutos Unglück
